reviewText: The DVD has 8 films, over 2 hours, of footage designed to help pilots deal with crashes.  The films are cold land survival, hot land survival, survivals kits - rafts and accessories, survival medicine, open water survival, survival signaling, and tropical survival.  Sometimes you may have to adjust the volume but it never froze nor did it break up, which is good.  It you live in a rough part of the world it may be something you want to watch or have your children watch.
